snippet.title: HUNGER | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
HUNGER is a PvPvE first-person horror extraction shooter and slasher with RPG elements. Survive Napoleonic Europe in the aftermath of the Bacterium. Choose a unique survivor to venture out, quest, scavenge, fight, and prevail.

WISHLIST NOW!

STEAM STORE
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1752080/HUNGER

EPIC GAMES STORE
https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/hunger-cde4bb
